introduction: National Geographic's new 3-part series will feature Dan Buettner, New York Times best-selling author of 'The Blue Zones: Lessons for Living Longer From the People Who've Lived the Longest' and his work. Buettner's National Geographic cover story on longevity, 'The Secrets of Living Longer' was the magazine's third best-selling issue in history. The work of Dan Buettner has been profiled in People, The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, Sports Illustrated, The Washington Post, and USA Today.Episodes include When Will You Die?, Will You Make a Million? and What Drives You Crazy?.内容介绍：金钱、性、婚姻、死亡率等等。每集节目中，数据科学家杰克波威将探讨一个攸关人生的重要主题，揭露其隐藏的惊人科学。藉由令人讶异的统计数字、街头实验和互动游戏，本节目将找出人生谜题的答案，提供工具以协助你掌控自己的命运，进而永远改变你的人生。
